articles.author: Barak Ravid, Dave Lawler
articles.title: Officials from Ukraine, U.S. and Europe to meet Saturday on Trump's plan - Axios
articles.description: The meeting comes amid sky-high transatlantic tensions.
articles.content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Thursday that the Trump administration hopes to reach a "full understanding" over its peace plan by Christmas, but critical gaps remain on the issues of te… [+5416 chars]
